alert.note: Alert for Centre; Clearfield; Clinton; Columbia; Lycoming; Montour; Northumberland; Sullivan; Union (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued March 28 at 2:27PM EDT until March 28 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Central Centre County in central Pennsylvania... Northeastern Clearfield County in central Pennsylvania... Southern Clinton County in north central Pennsylvania... Northwestern Columbia County in central Pennsylvania... Southern Lycoming County in north central Pennsylvania... Northwestern Montour County in central Pennsylvania... Northwestern Northumberland County in central Pennsylvania... Sullivan County in north central Pennsylvania... Northeastern Union County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 225 PM EDT, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from S.B. Elliot State Park to Lecontes Mills to near Clarence to Waterville to Barbours to near Sugar Run, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Extremely poor visibility in snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts up to 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect hazardous road conditions. For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the Dubois Route 255 and Limestoneville exits, specifically from mile markers 110 to 214. This includes Interstate 180 from mile markers 1 to 29. Locations impacted include... Williamsport, Lock Haven, Milton, Clearfield, Montoursville, Jersey Shore, Laporte, Carroll, Woodland, Lamar, Muncy and Watsontown. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Consider avoiding or delaying travel until the snow squall passes your location. If you must travel, use extra caution and allow extra time. Rapid changes in visibility and slick road conditions may lead to accidents.

area.areaDesc: Centre; Clearfield; Clinton; Columbia; Lycoming; Montour; Northumberland; Sullivan; Union
